mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.create_time, sk.state, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckillId", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as "seckill.start_time", s.end_time as "seckill.end_time", s.create_time as "seckill.create_time" from success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id =#{seckillId}
